response.original_title: La Dispute – NOWDTC documentary by Martin (CHAPTER I - Clinically Avoidant)
response.overview: Director Martin offers unprecedented access to the band's creative process, documenting their journey from initial concepts to final recordings in Australia. Experience the tensions, breakthroughs, and quiet moments of inspiration that birthed "No One Was Driving the Car" across Australia, Manila, Bicester, and Grand Rapids.
response.title: La Dispute – NOWDTC documentary by Martin (CHAPTER I - Clinically Avoidant)
